description: Shopee Open Platform is a go-to source of Open APIs and services created to support developers serving Shopee sellers with different ecommerce needs
notes:
This appears to be the introduction/overview page of the Shopee Open Platform documentation. Key information extracted:

1. Languages Supported: English, 简体中文, 繁體中文, Português, ไทย

2. Main Features:
- Powerful APIs for orders, products, marketing with push notification services
- Comprehensive developer services including onboarding, testing, release, and maintenance
- Open API testing tools and sandbox environments
- Documentation, Support Center, and Announcement sections

3. Target Users:
- Software service providers
- Sellers with software development capabilities

No specific API endpoints, parameters, or response fields are shown on this overview page.
